repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A multi-text (possibly composite?) manuscript, entitled Cāsttiram Aintu on its additional title page, containing the following works on traditional medicine:
The Ñāṉaveṭṭiyāṉ kaṟpamuṟai Aṟuvatu viruttam (enlisted on the title page as: Kaṟpamuṟai, "Recipes for panacea"), a medical text ascribed to an author named Veṭṭiyāṉ, in 61 verses (f1r-f7r = U2).
The Karuvūrār palatiraṭṭu muṉṉūṟu (Karuvūrār palatiraṭṭu, "Anthology of Karuvūrār"), a medical text ascribed to siddhar Karuvūrār, in 229 verses (marginal title suggests, that the original text consisted of approx. 300 verses, so the text in the manuscript seems to be incomplete) (f8r-f38r = U3).
The Akasttiyar tirunaṭaṉa-cūsttiram (Tirunaṭaṉa cūttiram, "Treatise on the Sacred Dance"), a text on medicine and yoga ascribed to the siddhar Akasttiyar, in 48 verses (f1r-f7v = f39r-f45v = U4).
The Pañcarattiṉa-pūpati-māttirai (Pañcarattiṉa-pūpati-mālai, "Royal garland of the five jewels"), a medical text containing several pratical recipes (f1-f5v = f46r-f50v = U5).
Vayittiya-cillaṟai ("Fragments on medicine"), a text which consists of several medical recipes (f1r-f4r = f51r-f54r = U6).
Veṭṭaikku Maruntu, unblackened, added on guard leaf (f5 = f55 = U7).

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil folation in left margin. Arabic library foliation (lf) in pencil on right margin.

collation.desc: 7 folios = Nāṉaveṭṭiyāṉ kaṟpamuṟai aṟuvatu viruttam. Tamil foliation 1-7 = Library Arabic foliation 1-7.
31 folios = Karuvūrār palatiraṭṭu muṉṉūṟu. Tamil foliation 8-38. Arabic foliation 8-38.
7 folios = Akastiyar tirunaṭaṉa-cūstiram. Tamil foliation 1-7. Arabic foliation 39-45.
5 folios = Pañcarattiṉa-pūpati-māttirai. Tamil foliation 1-5. Arabic foliation 46-50.
4 folios = Vayittiya-cillaṟai. Tamil foliation 1-4. Arabic foliation 51-54.
1 folio = Veṭṭaikku Maruntu. Tamil foliation 5 (unblackened). Arabic foliation 55.

supportDesc.condition: Very good state of preservation, in spite of bore holes caused by insects.

decoNote.desc: Seven "floral" shapes composed of six circles each punch-marked (U6, folio 5v). See also U1 (f[1]v).

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 134 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated neither by Vinson (1868) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 25, n0. 134..
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 36r, no. 134.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 36, no. 134. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lm = left margin, lc = left column, rc = right column, 1c = first column, 2c = second column, 3c = third column, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Updated to TST encoding and edited by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.

seg.seg: veṟṟi tarum ñāṉam veṭṭiyāṉ āyirattiṉ mēlāka vayittiyattai viḷampiṉār cittamuḷḷa kāyacitti māyacitti tiṟamāṉa vātacitti vaciya citti ittalattil muṉṉōrkaḷ maṟaittat ellāmm iyampiṉēṉ nūlkaḷilē yēḷiyōrkkāka cuttamāka kaṟpa vakai koṇṭa pērkaḷ cukamāka iruppataṟku colvēṉ uṇṭē = 1 =

pāṭukiṟēṉ palatiraṭṭu muṭivai ellām patarāmal tici taṟāmal paṇ pāyam kēḷ pāṭukurēṉ cāttiram cūttiramun toyntu pā?ai yellāñ curukki yoru mālaiyāka pāṭuku?ēṉē kurukkiṭaiyum pārttu parāpararttiṉ nilai mutalāy pattiyāka pāṭukuṟēṉ vētānta muṭivai yellām paraṉ maṟai k?ṇe caṉakkaṉ pātattai pārttē = 1 =

nāṭiyatōr puraṇamām vētāntattil naṭaṉatirucūstirattai pāṭutaṟku āṭiyatōr kaṇapatiyuṅ kantaṉ kāppu aruḷperukuñ cittar mutal riṣikaḷ kāppu kūṭiyatōr ñāṉam aruḷ vālaiyālē kūṟukirēṉ Akāra mutal rīṅ kārattāṟ pāṭiyatōr palanūlkaḷ poyyāy pēr kapāl ākum entaṉuṭa nūlu tāṉē 1 =

ab.seg:
tāṉāṉa ñāṉam atu pattu nūṟu taṉai kkuṟikki oru nūṟuñ cārntu coṉṉēṉ tēṉāṉa vātam atu laṣṣaṅ kāppu ceppiṉēṉ iraṇṭu kāṇṭan tinamāyt tāṉē kōṉāṉa ataik kuṟukki irunūṟuñ coṉṉēṉ kūṟiyatiṟ paṭupāti kūṟiṉēṉē = 2 = kūṟiṉēṉ vayittiyattiṟ cūttirattāṉ koṭṭiṉēṉ karumaṟaippillāmal tāṉ āṟiṉēṉ atil aṭakki pāṭitt ēṟiy appaṉē vayittiyattiṟ karukkuruvuñ coṉṉēṉ ṟēriṉēṉ cevuṭaṉukkuṅ kuruṭaṉukkut teḷiyav aṉṟē ceppiṉēṉ ṟeḷivatāku mīṟiyē vāti ceyyum vayittiyan tāṉ viḷampiṉēṉ pūraṇa cūttiran tāṉ pārē = 3 = pārappāy irunūṟṟuppattiṉāṟuḷḷē palaṉ ellām itiṟ cūṣṣam parivāy coṉṉē
ṉ Ār appāy inta nūl nāṟpatteṭṭum āṭalām vātamoṭu ñāṉavarai citti kār appāy inta nūl veḷiyiṟ pōṭṭēṉ kāraṇamāṅ kuruvaruḷē kāṇap pōṟṟi cēr appā pūraṇattiṉ vālaiyālē cekaccālaṅ kūṭi niṉṟa tēviyāmē = 4 =

viḷaṅkum nāṟpat
teṭṭu cūs·tiran tāṉ murṟē 48 =
